name: Skyline Delays
description:
This is a project started as a part of System Fictional Jam

Planning on working on updates after as I have drafts of additional content.

This is a module for a hypothetical 2d6 game for a small party size ttrpg called With the Fates.

The adventure is a exercise in futility where the party is given a delivery job to someone higher up in a scaffold of outposts in a convoluted space elevator. There is a hold up and passage to higher levels is blocked off. They're taking numbers, the ticker reads 6047, it's read that for years.

What's included now:

Sample PDF:

  • 5 NPCs also in the queue
  • 4 new thoughts!

Chracter Portraits!

Vector Map (preview, will be included with details in future update)|

All art is either by me (Rhea) or is Public Domain / CC0 or edited Public Domain / CC0 images
